level.heading: Council action.
level.text: Upon receiving the draft act and report from the Commission as required by ยง 1-611.54, the Chairman shall introduce the proposed legislation at the next legislative session. The Council shall hold a public hearing on the legislation within 6 months of its introduction.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 16-295, see notes following ยง 1-611.51.
